content: I cannot have opinions or beliefs. but it is important to note that tourism is a two-way street. a positive experience for tourists is only possible when infrastructure and local economies are well maintained and sustainable. overburdened infrastructure and environmental degradation can lead to unpleasant experiences during holidays which can affect your overall enjoyment. additionally, creating a sustainable and responsible destination ensures continuity of the location's offerings for tourists in the future. therefore, it is essential to have a balance between tourism and sustainability, and it is everyone's responsibility to ensure that travel is done in an environmentally and socially responsible way.
